deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring qBittorrent using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the qBittorrent YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
deprecated_yaml.title: The qBittorrent YAML configuration is being removed
